verses.roman:
śuni' bhaṭṭācārya haila parama vismita
mukhe nā niḥsare vāṇī, ha-ilā stambhita

synonyms: śuni'-hearing; bhaṭṭācārya—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; haila—became; parama—very much; vismita—astonished; mukhe—in the mouth; nā—not; niḥsare—vibrates; vāṇī—words; ha-ilā—became; stambhita—stunned.
translation: Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya became very astonished upon hearing this. He became stunned and said nothing.
